code: var constants={ADD_TRANS:"ADD_TRANS",DEL_TRANS:"DEL_TRANS",EDIT_TRANS:"EDIT_TRANS"};export var AddTrans=function AddTrans(transaction){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:constants.ADD_TRANS,payload:transaction});};};export var DelTrans=function DelTrans(id){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:constants.DEL_TRANS,payload:id});};};export var EditTrans=function EditTrans(oldTransaction,newTransaction){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:constants.EDIT_TRANS,payload:{oldTransaction:oldTransaction,newTransaction:newTransaction}});};};export default constants;
